ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Velious Factions?
ygData.msgSnippet: I guess that settles it... Death to the oversized barbarians. One last thought though, Do you think that by questing it is possible to raise all 3, in a sense
ygData.messageBody:
I guess that settles it... Death to the oversized barbarians.

One last thought though, Do you think that by questing it is possible to
raise all 3, in a sense that the quests will counter the negative and add on
to the good side?

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Mann [mailto:dabard@...]
Sent: December 21, 2000 4:41 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Velious Factions?


Kill a dorf = good giant and bad dorf
Kill a giant = good dorf, good dragon, and bad giant
Kill a dragon = good giant and bad dragon


-=B=-
45th
The Rathe

with the subject submissions.
